abstract: Poland's constitutional court rules in favor of 2015 law that limits ability of people whose property was seized before and after World War II in Warsaw to apply for restitution.

headline.print_headline: Polish Court Limits Claims for Seizing of Property
headline.main: Polish Court Limits World War II-Era Restitution Claims in Warsaw

snippet: The constitutional court in Warsaw upheld a 2015 law that substantially restricts potential claims by former property owners....
lead_paragraph: The constitutional court in Warsaw upheld a 2015 law that substantially restricts potential claims by former property owners.
